Primary Contact: Grace Balbutin, Director of SAIL; Phone: 1.604.688.1927 ext 222; Email: gbalbutin@bcceas.ca
Alternate Contact: Margaret Verheyden, Office Manager; Phone: 1.604.688.1927 ext 258
Service Details: - Offers a safe, toll free line for older adults--and those who care about them--to talk about situations where they feel they are being abused or mistreated, or to receive information about elder abuse prevention - Staff and trained volunteers provide a listening, non-judgmental and supportive ear, refer callers with a legal question or problem to our legal staff, and may refer 50+ callers who are victims of abuse or family and sexual violence, and who need practical and emotional support to our Victim Services Program
Former Name: BC Coalition to Eliminate Abuse of Seniors
